comments:
[Smoke][Deployment]Exception is thrown when view report[0601]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070320-1038
Steps to reproduce:
1.use Tomcat 5.0.28 or 5.5.7 to deploy
2.start server then click "View Example"
3.change frameset to run http://spm2003:8082/birt20070320/run?__report=test.rptdesign&sample=my+parameter
Expected result:
1.report can be previewed
Actual result:
Exception thrown
Error log:
See attached screen shot
When call Engine task, met exception. Reassign to engine team to check it.

Need to update build script, reassign to Data team

The problem exists in build script of Data Adapter. In original build script when building api package all the packages in plugin data adapter have been included. This is however incorrect. When some implementation classes in data adapter use non-api classes of Data package the exception is thrown.

Fix the build script so that it is now only include the necessary api packages.
